00009 Alignment::Alignment(char* fileName)
00010 {
00011         this->fileName = fileName;
00012         file = new igzstream(fileName);
00013         if (!file->good())
00014         {
00015                 // exception openFileFail
00016                 throw 1;
00017         }
00018         else
00019         {
00020                 // read the first "SENT: x" from the alignment
00021                 string word;
00022                 *file >> word; // SENT:
00023                 *file >> sentenceNum; // x
00024         }
00025 }

00027 void Alignment::nextSentence(unsigned int srcLength, unsigned int targetLength)
00028 {
00029         this->srcLength = srcLength;
00030         this->targetLength = targetLength;
00031 
00032         srcVec.clear();
00033         targetVec.clear();
00034 
00035         // read the alignment for the current sentence
00036         unsigned int srcWordNum, destWordNum;
00037         string word;
00038         while (*file >> word)
00039         {
00040                 if (word == "SENT:")
00041                 {
00042                         *file >> sentenceNum;
00043                         break;
00044                 }
00045                 else
00046                 {
00047                         *file >> srcWordNum;
00048                         *file >> destWordNum;
00049                         srcVec.push_back(srcWordNum);
00050                         targetVec.push_back(destWordNum);
00051                 }
00052         }
00053 }
00054 
00055 unsigned int Alignment::getMinTargetAlig(unsigned int j1, unsigned int j2)
00056 {
00057         unsigned int min=this->targetLength;
00058 
00059         for (unsigned int k=0; k<srcVec.size(); k++)
00060         {
00061                 if (srcVec[k]>=j1 && srcVec[k]<=j2 && // j1 <= src <= j2
00062                         targetVec[k]<min
00063                 )
00064                         min = targetVec[k];
00065         }
00066         return min;
00067 }

00076                         targetVec[k]>max
00077                 )
00078                         max = targetVec[k];
00079         }
00080         return max;
00081 }

00111 PhrasePair* Alignment::outputPhrase(unsigned int j1, unsigned int j2, unsigned int i1, unsigned int i2, vector<unsigned int> &srcWords, vector<unsigned int> &targetWords)
00112 {
00113         vector<unsigned int> src, target;
00114         src.resize(j2-j1+1);
00115         target.resize(i2-i1+1);
00116 
00117         // j = column
00118         for (unsigned int j=j1; j<=j2; j++)
00119         {
00120                 src[j-j1] = srcWords[j];
00121         }
00122 
00123         // i = row
00124         for (unsigned int i=i1; i<=i2; i++)
00125         {
00126                 target[i-i1] = targetWords[i];
00127         }
00128 
00129         return new PhrasePair(src, target);
00130 }
